title: New Client Profile Background Change!
body: So i'm on the new client, and I have Elementalist Lux as the background for my Profile. I really want to get rid of it, but I don't know how. I googled it, but I couldn't find any answers. Anyone know?

replies.body: I agree wih Lew's info!  Additionally, the background can show the champion you most recently played.  Keep playing another champ to get that profile updated.  I hope that helps!
If you are using an Elementalist Lux icon it will change your background in the client and if you remove it it will go away.
